attributes.action: Let children stay home after exams are concluded.
attributes.additional_details: (Examples of exams are SATs, End Of Year exams, GCSE and A-levels.
attributes.background: After children or 6th formers are done with their exams for the year, whats the point of going to school anymore if they don't need to revise or do any work? Why should we make children still go to school if they don't have any revision to do anymore?

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the school, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this with the school's senior management and/or the governing body.
